description: From Middle English aventurous, aunterous, auntrous, from Old French aventuros (whence French aventureux).

adjectives.description: adventurous (comparative more adventurous, superlative most adventurous)

entries.meaning: (of a person) Inclined to adventure; willing to take risks; prone to embark on hazardous enterprises; daring.
(of an act or product) Full of risks; risky; liable to be in danger; requiring courage; rash.
